level.heading: Capacity of settlor of revocable trust.
level.text: The capacity required to create, amend, revoke, or add property to a revocable trust, or to direct the actions of the trustee of a revocable trust, is the same as that required to make a will.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 601 of the Uniform Trust Code.
